body:
People are always asking why we don't have any documentation on things like `filter_file`, `install_tree`, `LibraryList`, etc. This PR adds API Documentation for everything in `lib/spack/llnl`. We may still want to add more information to the Packaging Guide, but this PR is a good start.

Also fixes #2874.
title: Add API Docs for lib/spack/llnl
